tab1.title1: Welcome to Primal Chaos CornHub PvP Server!
tab1.text1:
Please note this server is in the early stage so, please expect lag, bugs, or crashes!
You can expect bugs!


But don't worry, the server saves every 10 mins! To prevent large rollbacks on your progress.
Check out CornHub's Discord for updates or any information regarding the server!
